titles.title: Creating American Investment, Redevelopment, and Opportunity Task Force Act
A bill to establish the Creating American Investment, Redevelopment, and Opportunity Task Force.
Creating American Investment, Redevelopment, and Opportunity Task Force Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

bill.summary:
Creating American Investment, Redevelopment, and Opportunity Task Force Act
This bill establishes the Creating American Investment, Redevelopment, and Opportunity Task Force. The goals of the task force shall include expanding affordable housing, improving infrastructure, and spurring investment in Alexander County, Illinois.
